content: {"name": "Salvation Army, Brownsville Corps - Food Pantry", "alternate_name": "", "description": "-The days given in schedule are registration days. The food is only given after registration on the days indicated on the schedule. Please note registration and distribution DO NOT happen on the same day.", "email": "", "url": "https://www.facebook.com/brooklynbrownsvillecorps", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "280 Riverdale Ave", "address_2": null, "city": "New York", "state_province": "NY", "postal_code": "11212", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.6610816, "longitude": -73.9060831}, "phones": [{"number": "(718) 345-7050", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Pre-registration required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "ID required"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clients can visit: Once a month"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Appointments required"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}]}
